title: How to start singing lessons - Quora

response.answer_text: Go to Craigslist and find a singing teacher near you. You may need to try a lesson with more than one teacher to find a good fit. You will know you have a good fit with the teacher if you notice how much better you are singing in your lessons. Record yourself singing the exercises in your lesson th hear your progress and to practice with between lessons. You also might consider buying an inexpensive keyboard to use for reference pitches. Good luck. You can do it
VOCAL WARM UPS: Your Complete Vocal Warm Up Program
